item.description:
Downward Doggin' on Sunday's - 

Hey yoga lovers, both Newbies and advanced levels welcome. Have you ever wanted to try a yoga class?  Or, a yoga class...Outside?  Let us celebrate the warmer days and beautiful New England landscape by practicing yoga near the water in June!

B. Y. O. M. (Bring your own mat) - we do have a few extras for you to borrow, but let us know beforehand.

The class will run on Sunday morning at Webb Memorial State Park off Route 3A in North Weymouth (there is a parking lot).  The class will start at 10 am - 11:15 am, so please arrive a few minutes early to set your mat up and sign up.  

The certified yoga instructor, Lee, has been teaching for 6 years and remains an active teacher in corporate wellness centers, YMCA, area fitness centers, among other destination tropical locations.  She enjoys making all yoga levels feel welcome and also challenges the advanced yogi.

All levels welcome, and the price for drop in class is $9.  Please bring cash, and sign yourself in on the class attendance list.  (The exception is the people that paid for the 3-pack class a this is a make up class).

What you may want to bring with you... Yoga Mat, Water, towel, sunscreen, and wear comfy clothes preferably layers of clothing so if you get hot, you will be comfortable.  

If it rains, a cancellation notice will be posted or sent through email a few hours beforehand.

The event will close at 7 pm Saturday evening, so please RSVP before then with a yes or no.

 

Thanks, and see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Webb Memorial Park is located on Neck Street, which turns into River (on 3A in Weymouth - across from Dunkin Donuts) - follow past the beach and drive all the way to the end. We will be waiting next to the entrance.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Downward Doggin' on Sundays
